body:
BUILT IN 1927, THE CONEY ISLAND CYCLONE IN BROOKLYN WAS THE VISION OF RUSSIAN IMMIGRANT BROTHERS, JACK AND IRVING ROSENTHAL. THEY ERECTED THE CYCLONE CLOSE TO THE LOCATION OF AMERICA'S FIRST SUCCESSFUL COMMERCIAL COASTER, THE 1884 SWITCHBACK RAILWAY. THE BROTHERS' CONTRIBUTIONS TO THE AMUSEMENT SECTOR CONTINUED AS THEY MANAGED AND EVENTUALLY OWNED THE PALISADES AMUSEMENT PARK IN BERGEN COUNTY, NEW JERSEY. THE CYCLONE OUTLASTED ALL OTHER COASTERS FROM ITS ERA.


IN 1988, THE CYCLONE WAS RECOGNIZED AS A NEW YORK CITY LANDMARK ALONG WITH THE STATUE OF LIBERTY, BROOKLYN BRIDGE, AND WORLD TRADE CENTER. BY 1991, IT WAS LISTED ON THE NATIONAL REGISTER OF HISTORIC PLACES. TODAY, THE CYCLONE IS THE ONLY OPERATIONAL WOODEN ROLLER COASTER IN CONEY ISLAND AND ONE OF THE LAST REMAINING FROM ITS TIME WORLDWIDE.


THE CYCLONE IS CATEGORIZED AS A "GRAVITY RIDE OF THE WOODEN TRACK TWISTER TYPE." A CHAIN LIFTS THE THREE 4,000-POUND, EIGHT-PERSON CARS TO THE FIRST AND HIGHEST FALL OF 85 FEET. FOLLOWING THE INITIAL DROP, THE CARS MOVE ON THEIR OWN FOR THE REST OF THE RIDE. THE CARS NAVIGATE 2,640 FEET OF TRACK, MAKING 6 TURNS AND 12 FALLS. RIDERS EXPERIENCE 3.75 G OF FORCE AS THE CARS REACH SPEEDS OF UP TO 60 MILES PER HOUR. THE RIDE FINISHES IN JUST UNDER TWO MINUTES.


EVERY YEAR ON OPENING DAY, THE CYCLONE IS HONORED WITH SPEECHES, DEDICATIONS, AND A TRADITIONAL EGG CREAM CHRISTENING OF THE FRONT CAR BY BROOKLYN'S BOROUGH PRESIDENT. THE PARK PROVIDES FREE ADMISSION FOR THE FIRST 100 RIDERS, WITH SOME ENTHUSIASTS LINING UP THE NIGHT BEFORE. MANY STORIES CIRCULATE ABOUT THE CYCLONE. NOTABLY, AMERICAN AVIATOR CHARLES LINDBERGH REPORTEDLY SAID HIS RIDE ON THE CYCLONE WAS MORE EXCITING THAN HIS FIRST SOLO FLIGHT ACROSS THE ATLANTIC OCEAN.

AN EASY, DELICIOUS VEGETABLE TART WITH A UNIQUE SMASHED POTATO CRUST MAKES A PERFECT DISH AS WE WELCOME THE ONSET OF SPRING. THIS TART FEATURES THE SEASON'S VIBRANT PRODUCE SUCH AS LEEKS AND ASPARAGUS, ENHANCED BY THE FLAVORS OF FONTINA AND GOAT CHEESE. THE POTATO CRUST IS A DELIGHTFUL TWIST, GOLDEN AND CRISP ON THE OUTSIDE, AND TENDER INSIDE. ACHIEVING THIS CRISPY CRUST INVOLVES A BLEND OF TECHNIQUES - PAR-COOKING POTATOES IN ALKALINE WATER FOR A STARCHY SLURRY, SMASHING THEM IN A WELL-GREASED TART PAN, AND PAR-BAKING THE UNFILLED CRUST ON THE OVEN'S BOTTOM RACK FOR QUICKER BROWNING.


THE FILLING IS INSPIRED BY A CLASSIC QUICHE, RICH AND CREAMY WITHOUT BEING HEAVY. SAUTÉED LEEKS AND ASPARAGUS WITH A HINT OF GARLIC AND THYME FILL THE TART, TOPPED BY SHREDDED FONTINA THAT FORMS A MOISTURE BARRIER OVER THE POTATO CRUST, ENSURING IT STAYS CRISPY. TANGY GOAT CHEESE, FRESH HERBS, AND A BINDING EGG CUSTARD COMPLETE THE DISH.


THE FINAL BAKE SETS THE CUSTARD, AFTER WHICH THE TART RESTS AT ROOM TEMPERATURE FOR TEN MINUTES TO ALLOW THE FILLING TO SOLIDIFY FURTHER. THOUGH BEST SERVED IMMEDIATELY AFTER RESTING, WHEN THE CRUST IS AT ITS CRISPIEST, THE TART REMAINS DELICIOUS AS IT COOLS. FOR THE BEST PRESENTATION, SLIDE OFF THE TART PAN EDGES BEFORE SLICING, GARNISH WITH FRESH HERBS, AND SERVE WITH A DOLLOP OF SOUR CREAM OR CRÈME FRAÎCHE.

THE SOFT HUM OF CHANGE RESONATES IN THE UNIVERSE'S FABRIC AS RENOWNED ASTROPHYSICIST JONATHAN MCDOWELL STEPS DOWN FROM HARVARD'S STORIED HALLS, LEAVING BEHIND THE UNITED STATES' BOUNDARIES. FOR OVER THREE DECADES, MCDOWELL HAS WOVEN HIS EXPERTISE INTO THE COSMIC TAPESTRY, SPECIALIZING IN X-RAY ASTRONOMY, AND FUNCTIONING AS THE UNSEEN FORCE BEHIND NASA'S CHANDRA X-RAY OBSERVATORY. YET, THE CALL FOR A SHIFT HAS GROWN LOUDER, ECHOING IN THE QUIET CORNERS OF SCIENCE'S DWINDLING FEDERAL BUDGET AND CHANGING POLICIES.

BEYOND THE LENS OF AN ASTRONOMER, MCDOWELL IS ALSO A CHRONICLER OF SPACE EXPLORATION, A VOICE THAT WHISPERS TO THOUSANDS ABOUT THE MYSTERIES OF THE COSMOS VIA HIS MONTHLY SPACE REPORT. NOW, AS HE PREPARES TO JOURNEY ACROSS THE POND TO BRITAIN, HIS FOCUS GRAVITATES TOWARDS DEDICATING MORE TIME TO DOCUMENT THE CELESTIAL DANCE. A MURMUR OF CHANGE ECHOES IN THE COSMOS AND IN THE HEART OF JONATHAN MCDOWELL, A MAN WHOSE LIFE HAS BEEN A SERENADE TO THE UNIVERSE.

IT'S LIKE WATCHING A '90S SITCOM, SANS THE CANNED LAUGHTER. THE RORSCHACH INKBLOTS HAVE BEEN PERFORMING THEIR PSYCHOLOGICAL MAGIC SINCE BEFORE CAPTAIN KIRK FIRST PHASERED AN ALIEN. THESE BLOTS, A BRAINCHILD OF HERMANN RORSCHACH (WHO WASN'T AN OBSCURE HARRY POTTER CHARACTER, SURPRISE SURPRISE), WERE THE TEST OF CHOICE FOR THOSE WHO'D RATHER DOWNPLAY THEIR DEEP-SEATED PHOBIAS THAN VOICE THEM OUT. 

PICTURE THIS: IT'S THE SWINGING SIXTIES, AND YOU'RE TRYING TO INTERPRET AN INKBLOT THAT LOOKS LIKE A MIX OF *MONA LISA'S* SMILE AND *THE SCREAM*. DO YOU SEE A FACE, AN ANIMAL, OR CTHULHU HAVING A BAD TENTACLE DAY? THIS WAS PSYCHOLOGY'S ANSWER TO A CHOOSE YOUR OWN ADVENTURE BOOK, SANS THE PAGE-TURNING.

FAST FORWARD TO THE PRESENT, WHERE THE INKBLOTS HAVE TURNED INTO MORE OF A MENTAL GYM THAN A DIAGNOSTIC TOOL. IN AN ELABORATE RUSE TO ASSERT OUR INDIVIDUALITY, WE STARE AT THESE INKY ODDITIES AND SHARE OUR INTERPRETATIONS, HOPING THEY ALIGN WITH THE MAJORITY. ONE MAN'S BUTTERFLY IS ANOTHER MAN'S DEMOGORGON, APPARENTLY. 

IN THE LATEST ACT OF COLLECTIVE IMAGINATION, WE'VE SEEN EVERYTHING FROM RUSSIAN GNOMES (PROBABLY NOT RELATED TO ANY HACKING SCANDALS) TO ALIEN WARRIORS (POSSIBLE STAR WARS REJECTS). INTERPRETATIONS ARE AS VARIED AS THANOS' DESTRUCTION PLANS, REMINDING US AGAIN OF THE HUMAN MIND'S UNCANNY ABILITY TO SEE DRAGONS IN CLOUDS AND UNICORNS IN TOAST. 

SO, FOLKS, KEEP STARING AT THAT INKBLOT UNTIL IT STARTS TO LOOK LIKE A GAME OF THRONES SPOILER, OR RICK ASTLEY. BECAUSE WHAT IS LIFE IF NOT A SERIES OF INKBLOTS BEGGING FOR OUR MOST ABSURD INTERPRETATIONS?

EVER WONDER WHY YOUR SKIN MIGHT GET THICK AND ROUGH WHEN YOU CAN'T STOP SCRATCHING THAT ONE SPOT? IT'S CALLED 'LICHENIFICATION', AND YES, IT'S AS GNARLY AS IT SOUNDS. IMAGINE YOUR SKIN TRYING TO ROCK A LICHEN COSPLAY – YOU KNOW, THOSE PLANT-LIKE THINGS THAT CHILL ON ROCKS AND TREES.

NOT REALLY A CONDITION ON ITS OWN, LICHENIFICATION IS JUST YOUR SKIN'S WAY OF SAYING, "DUDE, QUIT IT!" TO LONG-TERM IRRITATION OR SCRATCHING. USUALLY, IT'S A SIDE EFFECT OF SKIN CONDITIONS LIKE ECZEMA OR PSORIASIS. BUT HERE'S THE TRIPPY PART, THERE'S PRIMARY AND SECONDARY TYPES.

PRIMARY LICHENIFICATION, OR LICHEN SIMPLEX CHRONICUS, IS WHEN YOUR SKIN GOES ROGUE WITHOUT ANY PRIOR SKIN CONDITION. STUFF LIKE STRESS, ANXIETY, OCD, BUG BITES, TIGHT CLOTHES, DRY SKIN, OR NERVE IRRITATION CAN TRIGGER IT. SECONDARY LICHENIFICATION, ON THE OTHER HAND, IS WHEN AN EXISTING SKIN CONDITION MAKES YOU ITCH MORE AND YOU JUST CAN'T RESIST SCRATCHING.

MANIFESTATIONS OF LICHENIFICATION AREN'T UNIVERSAL. IT CAN SHOW UP ON YOUR HEAD, NECK, OR EVEN MORE INTIMATE AREAS, AND THE SYMPTOMS VARY DEPENDING ON YOUR SKIN TONE. ON ASIAN SKIN, IT CAN LOOK LIKE THICK, SCALY PLAQUES WITH SHARP EDGES, WHILE ON DARKER SKIN, IT MAY MANIFEST AS SHADES OF PURPLE, GRAY, OR DARK BROWN, OFTEN AROUND JOINTS WHERE THE SKIN FLEXES.

AND THE MORE YOU SCRATCH, THE WORSE IT GETS, CREATING THIS ITCH-SCRATCH CYCLE THAT'S SUPER HARD TO BREAK. IF YOU'RE DEALING WITH ECZEMA, OR OTHER SKIN CONDITIONS, YOU MIGHT BE MORE PRONE TO SECONDARY LICHENIFICATION. BUT FOLKS WITH DARKER SKIN OFTEN HAVE IT TOUGHER, AS THEIR ECZEMA SYMPTOMS AREN'T AS OBVIOUS INITIALLY, LEADING TO DELAYS IN DIAGNOSIS AND TREATMENT.

IF YOU THINK YOU'RE DEALING WITH LICHENIFICATION, A HEALTHCARE PROVIDER WILL LIKELY SCRUTINIZE YOUR SKIN, ASK ABOUT YOUR SYMPTOMS AND TRIGGERS, AND MIGHT EVEN ORDER SOME TESTS. TREATMENTS FOCUS ON BREAKING THE ITCH-SCRATCH CYCLE AND MIGHT RANGE FROM SKINCARE REGIMENS TO TOPICAL TREATMENTS AND MEDICATIONS.

LIVING WITH LICHENIFICATION CAN BE A REAL BUMMER, ESPECIALLY IF IT'S MESSING WITH YOUR SELF-ESTEEM. BUT STICK TO YOUR SKINCARE ROUTINE, FOLLOW YOUR DOC'S ORDERS, AND OVER TIME, YOUR SKIN CAN START ITS HEALING JOURNEY. REMEMBER, IT'S ALL PART OF THE PROCESS. AND IF YOU'RE NOT SEEING ANY PROGRESS OR YOU'RE JUST NOT SURE WHAT'S GOING ON, HIT UP A HEALTHCARE PROVIDER. THEY'VE GOT YOUR BACK (AND SKIN). REMEMBER, THE GOAL IS TO PREVENT THAT ITCH-SCRATCH CYCLE, SO YOUR SKIN CAN CHILL OUT AND GET BACK TO NORMAL.

body:
IN AN ALTERNATE UNIVERSE (RIGHT NEXT TO THE ONE WHERE SPOCK HAS A BEARD), REX BROWN, AKA REX ROCKER (BECAUSE NOTHING SAYS "METAL LEGEND" LIKE A RHYMING PSEUDONYM), SPILLED THE BEANS ON PANTERA'S EARLY YEARS. BACK IN '82, HE JOINED THE BAND, REPLACING TOMMY D. BRADFORD (WHO, RUMOR HAS IT, QUIT TO JOIN A BARBERSHOP QUARTET). *PLOT TWIST*: BROWN WAS A BAND GEEK, PLAYING IN THE HIGH SCHOOL JAZZ BAND WITH VINNIE PAUL ABBOTT AND "DIMEBAG" DARRELL ABBOTT, WHO WERE THEN KNOWN AS THE ABBOTT BROTHERS (A LA HARDY BOYS). 

THEIR EARLY PLAYLIST? PICTURE THIS: A LOVE IS A BATTLEFIELD MONTAGE BUT WITH MORE LOVERBOY AND VAN HALEN, SPRINKLED WITH DEF LEPPARD AND A DASH OF '80S POP SENSIBILITY. IT WAS METALLICA'S 'RIDE THE LIGHTNING' THAT CHANGED THE GAME, LIKE A BOLT FROM THE BLUE (LITERALLY). SUDDENLY, HEAVY RIFFING WAS ALL THE RAGE, LIKE FIDGET SPINNERS IN A MIDDLE SCHOOL.

ENTER PHILIP ANSELMO, THE WILDCARD FROM NEW ORLEANS WHO WASN'T YOUR AVERAGE NEIGHBORHOOD DUDE, LIKE THE STRANGER THINGS KIDS STUMBLING UPON ELEVEN. 

FUN FACT: REX'S EARLY MUSICAL JOURNEY READS MORE LIKE WHIPLASH THAN SPINAL TAP. FROM JAZZ BAND TO DRUM LINE, HE CUT HIS TEETH IN MUSIC CLASSROOMS, LEARNING FROM THE GREATS, LIKE THE BEATLES AND THE STONES. AND GUESS WHAT? HE STARTED AS A GUITARIST, NOT A BASSIST. *SHOCKER*.

PANTERA WAS THE ULTIMATE UNDERDOG STORY, TURNED DOWN MORE OFTEN THAN A TELEMARKETER, BEFORE ATCO RECORDS SWOOPED IN '90, RIGHT BEFORE THE RELEASE OF 'COWBOYS FROM HELL'. THEY WERE SMALL-TOWN TEXAS BOYS, SELLING CASSETTES OUT OF THEIR CAR TRUNK (46,000 COPIES!) BEFORE GETTING THEIR BIG BREAK. IT WASN'T THE END OF THEIR JOURNEY, BUT THE BEGINNING OF A ROCK AND ROLL ROLLERCOASTER.

YEAH, PANTERA HAD SOME MELODIC REMNANTS FROM THE '80S BUT EVEN A SONG LIKE 'FUCKING HOSTILE' HAD A POP TOUCH TO IT, MAKING IT POPULAR DESPITE THE RADIO BLACKLIST.

IN AN UNEXPECTED TWIST, PANTERA AND AMON AMARTH ARE GEARING UP FOR A US AMPHITHEATER TOUR, FEATURING ZAKK WYLDE AND CHARLIE BENANTE. IT'S A TRIBUTE TO FOUNDING MEMBERS VINNIE PAUL AND DIMEBAG, WHO PASSED AWAY TRAGICALLY, USHERED OUT OF THIS WORLD IN THE MOST ROCK 'N' ROLL WAY POSSIBLE. 

VINNIE AND REX HADN'T SPOKEN TO ANSELMO SINCE PANTERA'S SPLIT IN 2003 DUE TO A NASTY RIFT (THE YOKO ONO OF METAL). BUT DESPITE ALL THE DRAMA, THEIR LEGACY LIVES ON, ONE HEAVY RIFF AT A TIME.
